RESOLUTION URGING THE SECRETARY OF THE DEPARTMENT OF THE
INTERIOR AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT, AS THE VICE CHAIRPERSON FOR
PREPAREDNESS OF THE NATIONAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND
MANAGEMENT COUNCIL, TO DIRECT ALL LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS
TO PREPARE THEIR EVACUATION CENTERS IN VIEW OF COVID-19
